activities: Visit the Tsukiji Outer Market for delicious seafood
Explore the vibrant Shibuya crossing and Hachiko statue
Immerse yourself in the serene Meiji Jingu Shrine
Discover the colorful and trendy Harajuku district
Experience the futuristic Odaiba entertainment island
Enjoy panoramic views from the Tokyo Skytree
Explore the historic Asakusa district and Senso-ji Temple
